mapper.select: SELECT mber_id AS mberId, mber_email AS mberEmail, mber_pwd AS mberPwd, mber_name AS mberName, mber_birth AS mberBirth, mber_phone AS mberPhone, mber_regist_date AS mberRegistDate, mber_update_date AS mberUpdateDate, mber_gender_code AS mberGenderCode, mber_stat_code AS mberStatCode FROM tb_mber WHERE mber_id=#{mberId}

SELECT mber_id AS mberId, mber_email AS mberEmail, mber_pwd AS mberPwd, mber_birth AS mberBirth, mber_name AS mberName, mber_birth AS mberBirth, mber_phone AS mberPhone, mber_regist_date AS mberRegistDate, mber_update_date AS mberUpdateDate, mber_gender_code AS mberGenderCode, mber_stat_code AS mberStatCode FROM tb_mber
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_mber (mber_id, mber_email, mber_pwd, mber_name, mber_birth, mber_phone, mber_regist_date, mber_update_date, mber_gender_code, mber_stat_code) VALUES (#{mberId}, #{mberEmail}, #{mberPwd}, #{mberName}, #{mberBirth}, #{mberPhone}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), null, #{mberGenderCode}, 'C0202')
